desc: I found the answer to the ultimate question of life, the universe, and everything!

body:
My favorite commit message words are:

1. updated (used 830 times)
2. update (used 815 times)
3. powered (used 682 times)
4. https://github.com/gee1k/upic (used 682 times)
5. github (used 650 times)

I use words like "thanks" and "please" in my issues: - #2371: 【项目】：整理记录各个包管理器好用的镜像 - #191: 【开源自荐】各种语言，软件，系统的国内镜像，收藏这一个仓库就够了： Thanks-Mirror - #4: fedora镜像没了 - #274: How can I refer to this project to complete my own website construction - #95: noovertime7/gin-mysqlbak: 一款分布式高性能的备份系统，支持 MySQL、ElasticSearch 备份，多集群任务统一，数据集中存储 And many more...
